mapper.select: SELECT TREVCID, TREVID, TOPPARENTID, PARENTID, PARENTNICKNAME, MEMID, MEMNICK, COMMENTSTATUS, TREVCTEXT, TREVDEPTH, TREVCREGDATE, TREVDUPDATE FROM TREVIEWCOMMENT WHERE TREVID = #{trevId} AND COMMENTSTATUS IN ('CMT001', 'CMT003') START WITH TREVCID = TOPPARENTID CONNECT BY PRIOR TREVCID = PARENTID ORDER SIBLINGS BY TREVCREGDATE ASC
SELECT TREVCID, TREVID, TOPPARENTID, PARENTID, PARENTNICKNAME, MEMID, MEMNICK, COMMENTSTATUS, TREVCTEXT, TREVDEPTH, TREVCREGDATE, TREVDUPDATE FROM TREVIEWCOMMENT WHERE TREVCID = #{commentId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_TREVCID.NEXTVAL FROM dual
INSERT INTO TREVIEWCOMMENT ( TREVCID, TREVID, TOPPARENTID, PARENTID, PARENTNICKNAME, MEMID, MEMNICK, TREVCTEXT, TREVDEPTH, TREVCREGDATE ) VALUES ( #{commentId}, #{postId}, #{topParentId}, #{parentId}, #{parentNickname}, #{memId}, #{memNick}, #{content}, #{depth}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE TREVIEWCOMMENT SET COMMENTSTATUS = 'CMT002', TREVDUPDATE = sysdate WHERE TREVCID IN ( SELECT TREVCID FROM ( SELECT TREVCID FROM TREVIEWCOMMENT START WITH TREVCID = #{commentId} CONNECT BY PRIOR TREVCID = PARENTID ) )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT( REPORTID, REPORTERID, REPORTEDTREVCID, REPORTEDCONTENTTYPE, REPORTREASON, REPORTDATE, REPORTSTATUS ) VALUES( SEQ_REPORTID.NEXTVAL, #{reporterId}, #{reportedTrevcId}, #{reportedContentType}, #{reportReason}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{reportStatus} )
